title: TurboEmdr

content: There site is  not for  salechange my mind given the rising successand ranking in search enginges.

comments.author: adsdsainfo
comments.body: There are a million other sites that offer this, even ones that are free.Your site doen't have proper account management - users can't manage their personal data.Your site has a bad reputation from using spam accounts to promote it on Reddit and posting fake reviews.You just commited a huge GDPR breach by sending out an email with all users in the CC.The fine for this alone is at least 120k.Anyone dumb enough to buy your website needs to take into account that they can be held liable for that.

comments.author: TurboEmdr

Go ahead and and get this 120k  What a moron. People do this email marketing for decades and nothing happened. Dont quote here something you just read and things it has meaning.
